data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martinez, Leonel, Galvis, William (2017): Three new species of jumping spiders of the genus Hypaeus Simon, 1900 from Colombia (Salticidae: Salticinae: Amycini). Zootaxa 4282 (1): 192-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4282.1.12|3 occurrences
